description:
In order to investigate the mysterious “Spheres” deposited in various locations around the world by the KATO-KIKAN, members of the JUDA task force including Kouichi head to an ARMA production base located in South America.
Distracted by guilt for not being able to recognize Moritsugu’s physical disorder, Yamashita makes a blunder during the operation and ends up putting Moritsugu in danger. Panic-stricken Yamashita loses control and starts taking matters into his own hands...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ブラック・チエンバー
